__e: You've always been the bomb and you'll always be the bomb.
Now I'll take dynamite, bang so loudly that your eyes will pop out of your head!
His nickname was Dynamite Bob and instead of being scared or worried or concerned, he was proud of it.
And if that wasn't enough, she was dynamite in the water.
You know how your daddy used to say that you can only fish for so long before you got to throw a stick of dynamite in the water?
So I say: "Pay me $200 and... I'll tell girls you're dynamite in bed." So he did... and I did.
